description:
At the law firm of Jonathan R. Brockman, P.C., we devote our time and resources to helping those who suffered an injury or loss caused by another party's negligent, careless or unlawful actions. With five offices across Georgia, our law firm is one of the largest and most-respected personal injury practices in the state. From our Atlanta office, our attorneys serve clients throughout Fulton and DeKalb counties and the surrounding areas of Atlanta who have personal injury or wrongful death claims resulting from any of the following:

•Car accidents
•Truck accidents
•Motorcycle accidents
•Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
•Dog bites
•Dangerous property conditions
•Defective products
•Food poisoning and foreign objects in food
•Construction and workplace accidents
•Workers' compensation

Established by Jonathan R. Brockman, our law firm has served the residents of our community since 2001. During that time, we have secured substantial settlements and awards on behalf of our clients, earning our membership into the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Mr. Brockman has practiced law for more than 25 years, and attorneys Cynthia Matthews Daley and Allen McDuffie, have over 16 years and 27 years of legal experience respectively. Together, we can handle any case no matter how complex.

In all cases, we will work closely with you to provide the personalized attention your case deserves so that we can help you recover the compensation and benefits you need to support yourself and your family. For more information on how Jonathan R. Brockman, P.C., can best serve your legal needs, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
